roleset.name: to discard as useless

example.name: transitive
example.text: It also would junk an innovative market-based system for [*] trading emissions credits among polluters .
example.arg: innovative market-based system for [*] trading emissions credits among polluters

roleset.note: JUNK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'junk' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from junk.01-v predicate notes)
